rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Canadian Intervention in Russia, 1918-1919.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: On December 19, 1918, the Victoria Tribune, an important trade union newspaper of the time in British Columbia, carried the following comment on its editorial page: From its inception the move to send troops to Siberia has been involved in considerable obscurity ... Some day it may be that the whole thing will be cleared up and the public will be let into the secrets of statecraft which launched the country into this extra military expenditure ... Time will reveal some strange things in the great Siberian drama. This editorial comment concerned Canada's participation in the Allied intervention in Russia during 1918-1919. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: History.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: the Role and Possible Significanca of Potassium, Calcium and Magnesium in the Cardiac Actions of Digitalis Glycosides.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: Despite extensive laboratory and clinical investigations, the exact role of electrolyte changes in the cardiac action of digitalis is still obscure. While it is well established that potassium and calcium are essential ions for the maintenance of normal heart function, the relationship and possible significance of these ions in the pharmacological and toxicological actions of digitalis have been rather controversial. The primary objective of this investigation was to elucidate, if possible, these potassium-calcium-digitalis interrelationships. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Pharmacology.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: the Acid Phosphatases of Rat Liver.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: The enzymic hydrolysis of organic phosphate esters was first noticed in the beginning of the twentieth century. The enzymes catalyzing this reaction were found to occur in many microorganisms and in most animal and plant tissues. In 1907 Suzuki, Yoshimura and Takaishi (1) reported that phytin was hydrolysed by an enzyme present in rice and wheat bran, which liberates inorganic phosphate. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Biochemistry.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Rigid and Deformable Particles in Sheared Suspensions.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: The rotations of rigid rods and fused doublets of equal-sized spheres in a shear field are in excellent agreement with Jeffery's theory for ellipsoids when the equivalent axis ratio Re is used. For fused doublets Re = 2. The mechanism of collision between equal-sized rigid spheres differs in several respects from that found in earlier observations. The collisions are not sharply defined and the disturbance occurs well in advance of particle contact. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Chemistry.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Studies on the Metabolism of the Fungus Ascocybe Grovesii.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: Ascocybe grovesii was discovered in 1953 by Doreen E. Wells at the Division of Botany and Plant Pathology, Science Service, Department of Agriculture, Ottawa. (59) The species under study is the only known member of the genus. Apart from the work of Miss Wells, no other studies have been made of this fungus. Dr. C.M. Wilson of the Botany Department of McGill University, found that Ascocybe produced an aromatic odor during growth on a mixture of glucose and amino acids. Moreover, the fungus was found to be incapable of growth on glucose and inorganic nitrogen.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Botany.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Histological, Cytological and Histochemical Studies of the Mouse Epididymis.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: The vasa efferentia and the ductus epididymis are tubules which connect the testis with the vas deferens. The vasa efferentia are formed in the embryo from some of the mesonephric nephrons or Wolffian tubules. These join the Wolffian duct at their distal ends, and during prenatal development they establish a connection with the rete testis. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Zoology

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Aberrations and Scanning Properties of Some Microwave Lens Systems.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: With the aim to improve present microwave lens designs used in radar antennae, three lens systems were designed, built and tested. They are the lens and correcting plate, the thick lens and the sphere. They exhibit geometric forms as described by their names. The lens and correcting plate is a system that contains a thin plate that cancels the primary astigmatism present in a lens when the source is at two diametrically opposite positions 24Â° off the optical axis. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Physics.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Sovereign Rights in Space.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: The year 1958 should mark the beginning of man's travel into another dimension. This year and next, the United States in connection with the International Geophysical Year, is to place satellites into the outer reaches of the earth's atmosphere. These experiments with the consent of most nations of the world shall allow further exploration of new regions and open heretofore unknown vistas for man's ever questioning mind.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Law.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: The Temperature Dependence of the Work Functions of Sodium and Potassium.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: A theory has been developed for the temperature dependence of the work functions of monovalent metals which predicts major contributions from thermal vibrations and thermal expansion. The former has been calculated from the velocities of elastic waves making some allowance for anisotropy and dispersion, the result is only approximate for the alkali metals because of uncertain elastic constants; the latter has been calculated from the cohesive energy and consequently is more accurate for sodium and potassium than for copper and silver.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Physics.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Studies of Some Factors Affecting the Establishment of Certain Forage Species.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: Today in Canada there are approximately sixty-one million acres of land which are devoted to pastures and ranges, of which the greatest proportion is in a natural or unimproved condition, and therefore peak production is far from being realized. A fact that has been long known is that the sod crop represents the heart of a farm rotation. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Agronomy.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Production of a Toxin-Neutralizing Substance by Penicillium Cyaneo-Fulvum.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: The first reports on toxin-neutralizing substances date back to the early 1890's, when Metchnikoff demonstrated that Bacillus subtilis was able to produce substances which neutralized diphtheria toxin, tetanus toxin and snake venom after a period of "in vitro" combination. It was further shown that fungi, such as Isarias, Sporotrichous and Torula, parasites of insects and human parasites, destroyed the toxicity of various bacterial toxins (Metchnikoff, 1897).
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Bacteriology and Immunology.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: the Airspace in International Air Law.
rdf:Description.dc:contributor: Department of Political Science and International Law
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: The province of the present study is a legal and geo-political inquiry into the status of the navigable air-space. The fundamental law of the status of the air-space was restated or reaffirmed in 1944 at Chicago by the Convention on International Civil Aviation. Article 1 of this convention provided that 'every state has complete and exclusive sovereignty over the air-space above its territory.' [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Political Science and International Law.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Serological Investigation of the Corynebacteria.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: At present there is neither a general scheme nor are there even well defined criteria which may be followed in placing an organism within the genus corynebacterium. Morphological and physiological studies to date have not provided a satisfactory solution. The literature is indicative of extensive serological investigations but is, on the whole, concerned with the type species C. diphtheriae. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Bacteriology and Immunology.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Inverse Segregation in Aluminum-Copper Alloys.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: Segregation which occurs in slowly cooled castings and in the direction indicated by the equilibrium diagram is called "normal segregation". The first crystals to separate from the molten alloy during solidification are rich in the higher melting point alloy and occupy a position close to the mold face. As the solidification proceeds the growing dendrites push before them the residual liquid which is becoming continually enriched in the lower melting point alloy (usually the alloy of high solute concentration). [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Metallurgical Engineering.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: the Cranial Dura and Related Structures in the Region of the Hypophyseal Fossa in the Cow.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: The material submitted in this manuscript, is the result of an investigation of the gross and minute anatomy of the cranial dura and related structures in the region of the hypophyseal fossa in the cow. The minute anatomy is introduced for the express purpose of aiding one in the interpretation of the gross findings.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Anatomy.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: the British Attitude Towards the Armenian Question 1878-1908.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: The Armenian question as a whole has been lost sight of in the tangle of events and alliances that preceded the First World War. As the complicated diplomatic background of this period has been treated elsewhere, no attempt has been made to include it here. Where outside events had a direct influence on the question; however, mention has been made of them. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: History.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Deeming a predatory spouse unworthy to inherit under Canadian Common Law
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: Cette thÃ¨se expose l'injustice et les consÃ©quences potentielles dans la common law canadienne des Â«mariages prÃ©dateursÂ» impliquant des personnes Ã¢gÃ©es. Dans les cas oÃ¹ un conjoint vulnÃ©rable, victime de manipulation dans le mariage, est indument influencÃ© dans l'exÃ©cution d'un nouveau testament en faveur de son conjoint prÃ©dateur, cette thÃ¨se propose un recours en empÃªchant le conjoint prÃ©dateur d'hÃ©riter aprÃ¨s la mort du conjoint victime. Cette proposition est dÃ©veloppÃ©e Ã travers une Ã©tude comparative de la doctrine de l'influence indue du droit canadien et de ses Ã©quivalents du droit allemand. La Â«slayer ruleÂ» de la common law et la lÃ©gislation sur l'abus des personnes Ã¢gÃ©es contribuent Ã justifier la solution proposÃ©e.

The thesis exposes the injustice and potential consequences of predatory marriages involving elderlies under Canadian Common Law. It proposes a remedy to cases in which a vulnerable victim spouse, manipulated into marriage, is unduly influenced into executing a new will in favour of his or her predatory spouse, by banning the predatory spouse from inheriting after the victim spouse's death. The suggestion is developed through comparative study of Canadian undue influence and its German equivalents. The common law slayer rule and elder abuse legislation assist in justify the proposed solution.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Social Sciences - Law

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Theory of anomalous magnetotransport in triple quantum dots
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: In this thesis, we study Aharonov-Bohm oscillations arising in electronic transport through a triple quantum dot in a ring arrangement in a transverse magnetic field. We start from a microscopic Hubbard Hamiltonian and the Nakajima-Zwanzig generalized master equation to show that in the large-bias regime, transport through the triple dot can be described using a coherent master equation in the Lindblad form. We solve this equation numerically and analytically to compute the current transmitted through the triple dot. We show that the current exhibits oscillations of period h/ne with n>2 when the magnetic flux threading the ring is varied, and that under certain conditions the amplitude of the n=3 period is much larger than the amplitude of the n=2 period. We include a discussion of the effect of electric-field-induced dephasing on the h/ne oscillations, and show that the inter-dot dephasing rates increase as the ring size increases, causing the anomalous dominance of the n=3 oscillations to disappear in larger rings.

Dans ce mÃ©moire, nous Ã©tudions les oscillations de Aharonov-Bohm apparaissant dans le transport Ã©lectronique Ã travers trois boÃ®tes quantiques formant un anneau traversÃ© par un champ magnÃ©tique. Nous utilisons un Hamiltonien microscopique de Hubbard et l'Ã©quation maÃ®tresse gÃ©nÃ©ralisÃ©e de Nakajima-Zwanzig pour montrer que lorsqu'une grande tension Ã©lectrique est appliquÃ©e, le transport peut Ãªtre dÃ©crit Ã l'aide d'une Ã©quation maÃ®tresse cohÃ©rente dans la forme de Lindblad. Nous rÃ©solvons cette Ã©quation numÃ©riquement et analytiquement pour calculer le courant Ã©lectrique transmis Ã travers la triple boÃ®te quantique. Nous montrons que le courant oscille avec une pÃ©riode h/ne en fonction du flux magnÃ©tique traversant l'anneau et que, sous certaines conditions, l'amplitude de la pÃ©riode n=3 est beaucoup plus grande que l'amplitude de la pÃ©riode n=2. Nous discutons Ã©galement de l'effet du dÃ©phasage induit par les fluctuations du champ Ã©lectrique environnant sur l'amplitude des oscillations de pÃ©riodes h/ne et montrons que les taux de dÃ©phasage entre les paires de boÃ®tes quantiques augmentent quand la taille de l'anneau augmente, causant la disparition de la domination anormale des oscillations n=3 dans les anneaux mÃ©soscopiques de plus grande taille.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Physics - Solid State

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Accelerated aging of wheat grains-a prelude
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: Outre les protÃ©ines et leurs propriÃ©tÃ©s Ã©lastiques, de nombreux ingrÃ©dients de la farine, dont l'amidon et les lipides, contribuent aux propriÃ©tÃ©s fonctionnelles et rhÃ©ologiques des pÃ¢tes. Le vieillissement des grains de blÃ© contribue Ã amÃ©liorer les caractÃ©ristiques des composants de la farine de blÃ©. Ce processus de vieillissement naturel est long et l'industrie est prÃ©sentement Ã la recherche de procÃ©dÃ©s non chimiques qui permettraient d'accÃ©lÃ©rer le vieillissement des grains de blÃ© afin d'amÃ©liorer des farines de qualitÃ© supÃ©rieure rapidement aprÃ¨s la rÃ©colte. Dans cette Ã©tude, l'effet de vieillissement accÃ©lÃ©rÃ© des grains fraÃ®chement rÃ©coltÃ©s sur les propriÃ©tÃ©s physico-chimiques et thermiques des constituants de la farine a Ã©tÃ© Ã©tudiÃ©. Le vieillissement a Ã©tÃ© accÃ©lÃ©rÃ© en exposant les grains de blÃ© dont la teneur en eau Ã©tait entre 12 et 18% (base humide), Ã des tempÃ©ratures allant de 30 Ã 50Â°C pendant des pÃ©riodes de temps allant de 2 Ã 8 jours. La variÃ©tÃ© de blÃ© AC Walton a Ã©tÃ© utilisÃ©e pour les essais sur le vieillissement accÃ©lÃ©rÃ©. Les rÃ©sultats ont indiquÃ© que l'augmentation de la tempÃ©rature et du temps de stockage ont eu pour effet de rÃ©duire les teneurs en amidon et en protÃ©ines, et que ces derniÃ¨res n'avaient pas Ã©tÃ© affectÃ©es par la teneur en eau des grains de blÃ©. De plus, les farines obtenues Ã partir des grains ayant subits les traitements de vieillissement accÃ©lÃ©rÃ© ont exhibÃ© des tempÃ©ratures de gÃ©latinisation supÃ©rieures Ã celles des farines faites Ã partir de grains frais non-traitÃ©s. Cette Ã©tude a permis d'Ã©tablir les relations mathÃ©matiques entre les paramÃ¨tres (tempÃ©rature, durÃ©e, et teneur en eau) utilisÃ©s pour accÃ©lÃ©rer le vieillissement du blÃ© et les qualitÃ©s boulangÃ¨res des farines obtenues.

Aging of freshly harvested wheat grains for several years helps in enhancing the characteristics of flour components, thereby improving their functionality in bread making. This usual process of aging is highly time consuming, hence there is a need for an alternative process for improvement of the baking quality of flour in a shorter period of time of storage. In this study, effect of accelerated aging of the freshly harvested grains on physico-chemical and thermal properties of the flour constituents has been studied. The aging is accelerated by storing the wheat grains at a temperature between 30ËC and 50ËC for a period of 2-8 days with moisture contents of 12-18% w.b. (wet basis). Laboratory work on the chosen cultivar A.C. Walton was carried out. It was found that the total starch content and protein content of the flour decreased at the elevated temperatures and with longer storage periods, irrespective of the moisture content of the grains. On the other hand, the thermal properties of the aged wheat flour enhanced with the increase in the gelatinization temperature of starch, as compared to the freshly harvested grains. Hence the effect of accelerated aging of wheat grains on the physico-chemical and thermal properties of the flour was studied. The regression model developed clearly explained the effects of the three parameters including storage temperature, moisture content of grains and duration of storage, on the baking qualities of the flour.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Agriculture - Food Science and Technology

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Evaluation and optimization of cranberry seed oil extraction methods
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: L'huile de graines de canneberges est une huile de qualitÃ© qui peut Ãªtre mise en marchÃ© pour ses propriÃ©tÃ©s fonctionnelles "santÃ©" issues de sa composition particuliÃ¨re en acides gras omÃ©ga 3, 6 et 9 et de sa forte concentration en antioxydants. Il existe peu ou pas d'information sur la teneur en huile de la graine de canneberge, cependant l'industrie alimentaire s'intÃ©resse Ã l'extraction de cette huile, qu'elle effectue prÃ©sentement par pressage Ã froid, malgrÃ© un faible rendement. Afin de palier Ã ce problÃ¨me, une Ã©tude a dÃ©butÃ© afin d'analyser les rendements en huile obtenus par diffÃ©rents procÃ©dÃ©s d'extraction dont l'Ã©bullition Ã reflux, les microondes et les ultrasons. L'Ã©bullition Ã reflux amÃ©liore l'extraction en amÃ©liorant la diffusion du solvant par la chaleur, tandis que dans le cas des microondes et des ultrasons, c'est plutÃ´t la particularitÃ© des ondes qui influencent l'extraction. Les objectifs de cette recherche ont donc visÃ© Ã obtenir de bons rendements en huile avec une forte teneur en Î± - tocophÃ©rol. Lors des essais prÃ©liminaires, de meilleurs rendements ont Ã©tÃ© obtenus avec des graines moulues (10.11 Â± 0.2%) en comparaison avec des graines non moulues (8.17 Â± 0.3%), ainsi tous les essais d'extraction ont par la suite Ã©tÃ© faits avec des graines finement moulues et tamisÃ©es (1mm). L'hexane (10.2 Â± 0.2%) s' est avÃ©rÃ© plus efficace pour l'extraction qu'un mÃ©lange d'hexane: Ã©thanol (7:3) (6.45 Â± 0.1%). L'Ã©tude de l'extraction de l'huile s'est concentrÃ©e sur quatre facteurs opÃ©rationnels soit le ratio d'Ã©chantillon/solvant, la tempÃ©rature, le temps et la puissance appliquÃ©e pour l'Ã©bullition Ã reflux, et l'extraction microonde et par ultrasons. Nos rÃ©sultats ont dÃ©montrÃ© une augmentation du rendement en huile avec une augmentation du ratio Ã©chantillon/solvant Ã 10g/100 ml d'hexane, Ã une tempÃ©rature de 70Â°C pour l' Ã©bullition Ã reflux avec un rendement de 11.19 Â± 0.1% tandis qu'avec l'extraction microonde, les meilleures conditions furent pour un ratio d'Ã©chantillon/solvant de 5g/30ml d'hexane, et une puissance de 125W, donnant une rendement en huile de 24.15 Â± 0.3% Ã une tempÃ©rature de 66â°C. En comparaison, l'extraction ultrason, pour un ratio d'Ã©chantillon/solvant de 5g/30ml d'hexane, Ã une intensitÃ© de 150W, le rendement en huile a Ã©tÃ© de 32.35 Â± 0.3%. Ainsi, les meilleurs rÃ©sultats en terme de rendement en huile pour les diffÃ©rentes mÃ©thodes d'extraction sont classÃ©s comme suit: Ãbullition par reflux < Microonde < Ultrason. L'avantage de l'extraction par ultrasons fut son haut rendement en huile, pour un procÃ©dÃ© rapide, Ã tempÃ©rature peu Ã©levÃ©e. Le rendement maximal en huile a Ã©tÃ© obtenu par l'extraction ultrason avec 1.61 g. L'analyse de la qualitÃ© de l'huile, en particulier la teneur en Î± - tocophÃ©rol a Ã©tÃ© effectuÃ©e par spectrophotomÃ©trie Ã 520 nm et les rÃ©sultats ont dÃ©montrÃ©s que la teneur en Î± - tocophÃ©rol Ã©tait grandement affectÃ©e par la tempÃ©rature, Ã 70â°C dans le cas de l'Ã©bullition par reflux avec 0.266 Â± 0.02 Âµg, tandis qu'avec l'extraction microonde Ã la puissance de 125W au ratio de 5g/30ml d'hexane, la teneur en tocophÃ©rol Ã©tait de 0.346 Â± 0.007 Âµg, tandis que pour les ultrasons, la teneur en tocophÃ©rol Ã©tait de 0.428 Â± 0.01 Âµg pour une puissance de 100W. L'extraction par solvant, jumelÃ©e avec les microondes ou les ultrasons, libÃ¨re une plus grande concentration en Î± - tocophÃ©rol des cellules de la plante en comparaison avec la pression Ã froid. En conclusion, l'extraction par pression Ã froid obtient une huile de meilleure qualitÃ© que l'huile obtenue par Ã©bullition par reflux, tandis que l'extraction par microondes et par ultrasons est fortement recommandÃ©e pour un meilleur rendement en huile et une plus haute teneur en tocophÃ©rol.

Cranberry seed oil is a fine quality oil which can be marketed for its many beneficial functions to human health due to the presence of a unique combination of omega- 3, 6 and 9 fatty acids and the high concentration of antioxidants. Although there is no available clear data about the oil percentage of cranberry seeds in literature, an experiment was done to analyze the oil yields obtained through different processes such as heat reflux, microwave and ultrasound, both quantitatively and qualitatively. During preliminary experiments, better oil yields were obtained with ground seeds (10.11 Â± 0.2%) in comparison with unground seeds (8.17 Â± 0.3%) , and hence the seeds were made into a fine powder using a blender and the fine powders were separated by sieve (1mm). Hexane (10.2 Â± 0.2%) was also found to be more efficient in oil extraction than Hexane: Ethanol (7:3) (6.45 Â± 0.1%). The oil extraction process was based on four major operating factors namely the sample/solvent ratio, temperature, time and applied power for the heat reflux, microwave and ultrasound extraction. The results showed that the oil yield increased with an increase in sample/solvent ratio at 10g/100ml of hexane, temperature of 70â°C in heat reflux which provided an oil yield about 11.19 Â± 0.1% while in the case of microwave, best conditions were for a sample/solvent ratio of 5g/30ml of hexane, power at 125W, which gave an oil yield of 24.15 Â± 0.3% maintaining the temperature at 66â°C. In comparison, with ultrasound extraction at a sample/ solvent ratio of 5g/30ml of hexane, and a power at 150W, the oil yield was 32.35 Â± 0.3%. The best yield results obtained for the tested methods for extracting oil from seeds were found and compared as: Heat reflux < Microwave <Ultrasound. The advantage of ultrasound was a relatively high yield over other methods with a short process time and lower process heat from the applied power. Analysis of quality in oil particularly the concentration of Î± - tocopherol was estimated by spectrophotometry at 520 nm and results found that Î± - tocopherol concentration was greatly affected by temperature at 70â°C in case of heat reflux which retained around 0.266 Â± 0.02 Âµg while in the case of microwave at power 125W and ratio 5g/30ml of hexane the tocopherol retained was around 0.346 Â± 0.007 Âµg whereas in ultrasound the tocopherol was retained upto 0.428 Â± 0.01 Âµg on applying power at 100W. The solvent extraction with hexane coupled with microwave or ultrasound energy released a greater amount of Î± - tocopherol from the plant matrix than for cold pressed method. For conventional cranberry seed oil extraction the cold pressed method was a better option than heat-reflux method in terms of oil quality, otherwise newer techniques such as MAE and UAE are highly recommended both in terms of increased oil yields and increased tocopherol content.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Agriculture - Food Science and Technology

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Suppressive activity of CD4+Foxp3+ regulatory T cells in an animal model of spontaneous CD8+ T cell-mediated demyelinating disease
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: Le laboratoire du Dr. Fournier a gÃ©nÃ©rÃ© une lignÃ©e de souris (les souris L31) qui dÃ©veloppe de faÃ§on spontanÃ©e une maladie du systÃ¨me nerveux central qui conduit Ã la perte de la gaine de myÃ©line et qui est dÃ©pendante de la presence de lymphocytes T. Dans ce modÃ¨le les lymphocytes CD8+ sont les cellules effectrices de la maladie tandis que les lymphocytes T CD4+ jouent un rÃ´le rÃ©gulateur. Il a Ã©tÃ© dÃ©montrÃ© qu'une sous-population de lymphocytes T CD4+ qui expriment le facteur de transcription Foxp3 est impliquÃ©e dans la regulation des rÃ©ponses auto-immunes. Afin d'Ã©tudier le rÃ´le de cette population dans le dÃ©veloppement de la maladie neurologique des souris L31, le but de mon projet de recherche Ã©tait de caractÃ©riser de faÃ§on fonctionelle cette sous-population de lymphocytes T CD4+ rÃ©gulateurs des souris L31. Nous avons trouvÃ© que les lymphocytes T rÃ©gulateurs des souris L31 sont altÃ©rÃ©s dans leur capacitÃ© Ã supprimer la proliferation de cellules T effectrices in vitro. Ceci est dÃ» en partie Ã leur expression elevÃ©e de la protein B7.2 (CD86). Cependant, les lymphocytes T rÃ©gulateurs des souris L31 sont capables de prÃ©venir le dÃ©veloppement des symptÃ´mes neurologiques in vivo. Donc, bien que les lymphocytes T rÃ©gulateurs des souris L31 ne sont pas suppresseurs in vitro, notre donnÃ©es in vivo suggÃ¨rent qu'ils ont une fonction rÃ©gulatrice dans le dÃ©veloppement de la maladie neurologique des souris L31. Cette dichotomie pourrait nous permettre de dÃ©terminer les mÃ©canismes utilisÃ©s par ces cellules rÃ©gulatrices pour contrÃ´ler le dÃ©veloppement de la maladie neurologique auto-immune dans les souris L31.

Dr. Fournier's laboratory has generated a mouse strain (L31 mice) that spontaneously develops a CD8+ T cell-mediated demyelinating disease in the central nervous system. In this model of dysregulated costimulation, CD4+ T cells have a regulatory role. A subset of CD4+ regulatory T cells that express the transcription factor Foxp3 have been shown to regulate autoimmune responses. In order to investigate this population's role in disease development, the goal of my M.Sc research project was to functionally characterize the CD4+Foxp3+ regulatory T cell population in L31 mice.We found that regulatory T cells from L31 mice were impaired in their ability to suppress the proliferation of effector T cells in vitro. In part, this was because B7.2 (CD86) expression impeded regulatory T cell suppressive activity. However, regulatory T cells delayed the onset of neurological symptoms in vivo. Although L31 Treg are not suppressive in vitro, our in vivo data suggest that they have a regulatory function in L31 disease development. This dichotomy could provide insights into the mechanisms by which these regulatory T cells control disease development in L31 mice.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Health Sciences - Immunology

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Asessing the impacts of late Pleistocene megafaunal extinctions on global vegetation and climate
rdf:Description.dc:contributor: Department of Atmospheric and Oceanic Sciences
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: La fin de l'Ã©poque du PlÃ©istocÃ¨ne est une Ã©tape importante de l'histoire climatique de la Terre. En effet, c'est lors de cette pÃ©riode mouvementÃ©e que notre planÃ¨te s'est pour une ultime fois libÃ©rÃ©e des conditions glaciales qui perduraient depuis des dizaines de millÃ©naires, et souvent marquÃ©es par la prÃ©sence d'imposante calottes glaciaires dans l'hÃ©misphÃ¨re nord. Il est bien connu que ce changement climatique fut Ã©galement accompagnÃ© d'un dÃ©clin sans prÃ©cÃ©dent de plusieurs espÃ¨ces de grands mammifÃ¨res terrestres, y compris une extermination rapide et brutale du mammouth laineux. En raison d'une diÃ¨te composÃ©e en partie de vÃ©gÃ©taux provenant d'arbres prolifiques durant cette pÃ©riode, il y a de fortes raisons de croire que les ceux-ci auraient pu contribuer au maintien d'une faible densitÃ© forestiÃ¨re au sein de leur habitat. Par consÃ©quent, leur extinction aurait contribuÃ© Ã une rapide Ã©mergence d'une variÃ©tÃ© de petits arbres feuillus tant en SibÃ©rie qu'en BÃ©ringie, provoquant par la mÃªme occasion une rÃ©duction considÃ©rable de l'albÃ©do de surface, qui Ã son tour aurait entrainÃ© une augmentation globale de la tempÃ©rature.L'objectif visÃ© par cette Ã©tude est de quantifier l'impact potentiel qu'aurait pu avoir une extinction majeure de la mÃ©gafaune sur le climat de la Terre, par le biais d'une modification de la carte vÃ©gÃ©tale menant Ã une hausse de la tempÃ©rature. Afin d'examiner en dÃ©tail la rÃ©troaction de processus biogÃ©ophysiques Ã ce changement de tempÃ©rature, nous employons le modÃ¨le de complexitÃ© intermÃ©diaire de l'UniversitÃ© de Victoria (UVic) avec des scÃ©narios plus ou moins rÃ©alistes, dont une catastrophe aux proportions exagÃ©rÃ©es servant Ã dÃ©terminer les limites de que peut offrir le modÃ¨le UVic. Parmi les cas plus terre-Ã -terre figurent quelques tests de sensibilitÃ© menÃ©s sur des paramÃ¨tres tels que le taux de dÃ©boisement des mammouths, la grandeur de leur habitat, ainsi que l'annÃ©e de leur extinction. D'autres expÃ©riences ayant Ã©tÃ© menÃ©es portent sur un Ã©talement graduel d'un dÃ©clin des populations de mÃ©gaherbivores, ainsi qu'une simulation laissant libre cours aux Ã©changes de carbone entre l'atmosphÃ¨re et les autres constituants du systÃ¨me climatique, en autres mots une libre variation du niveau de CO2 dans l'atmosphÃ¨re.En gÃ©nÃ©ral, nous obtenons des rÃ©sultats qui se conforment assez bien avec ceux d'Ã©tudes similaires. Dans le cas d'un scÃ©nario catastrophique, nous enregistrons une baisse de l'albÃ©do terrestre Ã©quivalent Ã un peu moins de 0.006, donnant lieu Ã une hausse de la tempÃ©rature se chiffrant Ã 0.175Â°C globalement. Quant aux expÃ©riences plus rÃ©alistes, les rÃ©sultats en trÃ¨s grande majoritÃ© confirment notre intuition.

The end of the Pleistocene marked a turning point for the Earth system, as climate gradually emerged from millennia of severe glaciation in the Northern Hemisphere. It is widely known that the deglacial climate change then was accompanied by an unprecedented decline in many species of large terrestrial mammals, featuring among others the near-total eradication of the woolly mammoth. Due to a herbivorous diet that involved the grazing of a large number of trees, their extinction is thought to have contributed to the rapid and well-documented expansion of dwarf deciduous trees in Siberia and Beringia, which in turn would have resulted in a significant reduction in surface albedo, leading to an increase in global temperature.In this study, we use the UVic ESCM to simulate various scenarios of the megafaunal extinctions, ranging from the catastrophic to more realistic cases, in order to quantify their potential impact on the climate system, and investigate the associated biogeophysical feedbacks between the growing vegetation and rising temperatures. The more realistic experiments include sensitivity tests based on the timing of extinction, tree clearance ration, and size of habitat, as well as a gradual extinction and a simulation involving free (non-prescribed) atmospheric CO2. Overall, most of the paleoclimate simulations and the sensitivity tests yield results that correspond well with our intuition. For the maximum impact scenario, we obtain a surface albedo increase of 0.006, which translates into a global warming of 0.175Â°C; these numbers are comparable in magnitude to those in similar studies.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Earth Sciences - Atmospheric Sciences

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Leptin as a molecular modulator of neuroinflammation
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: The adipocyte derived hormone, leptin, represents an important link betweenmetabolic status and immune function and may be a contributor to the onset ofinflammatory illness. The current project aimed to understand the role of leptin duringboth chronic and acute inflammatory states, and two mouse models were utilized:Experimental autoimmune encephalomyelitis (EAE) and an LPS-induced depression-likesyndrome. Here we have demonstrated that circulating leptin levels peak at early stagesof EAE development, corresponding to elevated SOCS-3 expression in brain, suggestingthe importance of leptin during the pathogenesis of this disease. Furthermore, we showfor the first time, that the LPS-induced recruitment of neutrophils into the brain followsthe time-course of depression-like behaviour after acute sickness responses subside, andthat both neutrophil recruitment and depression-like behaviours are attenuated as a resultof leptin neutralization. Pro-IL-1Î² expressing, brain invading neutrophils were found tobe most populous at the dissociation point of sickness and depression-like behaviours (48hours after LPS treatment) and leptin neutralization attenuated this recruitment. Finallythe effects of leptin on depression-like behaviour were shown to occur independently ofmicroglial activity or through modulation of hippocampal cell proliferation or survival.

La leptine, hormone synthÃ©tisÃ©e par les adipocytes, est un facteur important aussibien dans la rÃ©gulation du mÃ©tabolisme que dans la dÃ©fense immunitaire. La leptinepourrait jouer un rÃ´le important dans l'apparition des maladies inflammatoires. Notreprojet vise Ã comprendre le rÃ´le de la leptine dans deux Ã©tats inflammatoires, l'un Ã©tantun Ã©tat inflammatoire chronique et l'autre une inflammation aigue. L'inflammationchronique a Ã©tÃ© Ã©tudiÃ©e en utilisant un modÃ¨le expÃ©rimental de souris auto-immune(EAE) et l'inflammation aigue a Ã©tÃ© induite par l'injection de LPS Ã des souris. Nousavons dÃ©montrÃ© que la leptine circulante atteint des niveaux maximum Ã des stadesprÃ©coces du dÃ©veloppement des souris EAE, correspondant Ã un niveau d'expressionÃ©levÃ©e de SOCS-3 dans de cerveau, ce qui suggÃ¨re de rÃ´le important de la leptine aucours de l'apparition de l'inflammation. De plus, nous avons montrÃ© pour la premiÃ¨refois, que le recrutement des neutrophiles dans le cerveau induit par l'injection de LPS suitl'Ã©volution temporelle des comportements dÃ©pressifs qui apparaissent aprÃ¨s la disparitiondes premiers symptÃ´mes de la maladie. De plus nous avons montrÃ© que le recrutementdes neutrophiles et la symptoms de dÃ©pression sont attÃ©nuÃ©s suite Ã la neutralisationleptine. Le Pro-IL-1 Ã exprimÃ© par les neutrophiles du cerveau est surtout prÃ©sent aupoint de dissociation entre les symptÃ´mes de la maladie et la dÃ©pression (48 heures aprÃ¨sle traitement par LPS) et la neutralisation de la leptine attÃ©nue ce recrutement. Enfin, leseffets de la leptine sur la dÃ©pression sont indÃ©pendants de l'activitÃ© microgliale ou de lamodulation de la prolifÃ©ration cellulaire des cellules issues de l'hippocampe ou de leursurvie.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Biology - Neuroscience

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: The role of intracortical inhibition in self-reported and exercise-induced fatigue in multiple sclerosis
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: La fatigue, un symptÃ´me frÃ©quent de la sclÃ©rose en plaques (SP), est un concept multidimensionnel qui englobe un manque subjectif d'Ã©nergie et de la fatigabilitÃ©, soit une baisse centrale et pÃ©riphÃ©rique de la capacitÃ© motrice. L'inhibition intracorticale rÃ©duite est en corrÃ©lation avec une plus grande fatigue rapportÃ©e chez les patients SP, mais le fait de savoir si cela se rapporte Ã la fatigabilitÃ© centrale et pÃ©riphÃ©rique est inconnu. Le but du projet Ã©tait de dÃ©terminer la contribution de l'inhibition intracorticale rÃ©duite aux diffÃ©rentes dimensions de la fatigue chez les patients atteints de SP. Le projet a Ã©galement explorÃ© si les patients atteints de SP ont des niveaux infÃ©rieurs d'inhibition intracorticale que les tÃ©moins en bonne santÃ© aprÃ¨s avoir contrÃ´lÃ© la taille des potentiels Ã©voquÃ©s moteurs (PEMs). L'inhibition intracorticale, la variable prÃ©dictive dans les analyses de rÃ©gression, a Ã©tÃ© mesurÃ©e sur 31 patients droitiers atteints de SP cyclique (rÃ©currente-rÃ©mittente) en utilisant deux mÃ©thodes TMS (les ratios d'inhibition intracorticale Ã court intervalle et les pÃ©riodes de silence controlatÃ©rales) sur la reprÃ©sentation du cortex moteur primaire du premier muscle interosseux dorsal droit. Les variables des rÃ©sultats Ã©taient comme suit: a) fatigue auto-dÃ©clarÃ©e, telle que rapportÃ© par l'analyse, sur le modÃ¨le de Rasch, de l'Ã©chelle de fatigue composÃ©e, b) fatigabilitÃ© centrale, le temps de latence pour que le seuil minimum moteur revienne aux valeurs de base et la rÃ©duction des PEMs aprÃ¨s une tÃ¢che de contraction maximale, et c) la fatigabilitÃ© pÃ©riphÃ©rique, une baisse dans le signal Ã©lectromyographique du muscle aprÃ¨s exercice. L'inhibition intracorticale chez les patients SP a Ã©galement Ã©tÃ© comparÃ©e Ã des tÃ©moins en bonne santÃ© aprÃ¨s avoir contrÃ´lÃ© la taille du PEM dans une analyse de rÃ©gression. Parmi les patients atteints de SP, l'inhibition intracorticale n'a pas prÃ©dit de fatigue rapportÃ©e, ps> .37. L'inhibition intracorticale n'est pas non plus en corrÃ©lation avec la fatigabilitÃ© motrice centrale ou pÃ©riphÃ©rique, ps> .20. De faibles PEMs Ã©taient liÃ©s Ã de plus grands ratios d'inhibition intracorticale Ã court intervalle (ou moins d'inhibition), r = -0,41, p <.02. Toutefois, les patients atteints de SP ont montrÃ© des niveaux normaux d'inhibition intracorticale mÃªme sans avoir contrÃ´lÃ© la taille du PEM, ps> 0,08. L'inhibition intracorticale peut ne pas Ãªtre le mÃ©canisme sous-jacent pour l'hyperactivitÃ© corticale chez les patients atteints de SP avec fatigue Ã©levÃ©e. Des niveaux infÃ©rieurs d'inhibition intracorticale n'ont Ã©galement pas menÃ© Ã une plus grande fatigabilitÃ© motrice centrale et pÃ©riphÃ©rique. L'effet de faibles PEMs sur l'inhibition intracorticale devrait Ãªtre contrÃ´lÃ©e par la stimulation Ã une intensitÃ© plus Ã©levÃ©e par rapport au seuil minimum moteur chez les patients atteints de SP.

Multiple sclerosis (MS) is a disease in which the myelin sheath covering of axons is damaged. Fatigue, a common symptom of MS, is a multidimensional concept encompassing a subjective lack of energy and fatigability i.e. a central and peripheral decline in motor performance. Reduced intracortical inhibition correlates with greater self-reported fatigue in MS patients but whether it relates to central and peripheral fatigability is unknown. The project's purpose was to determine the contribution of reduced intracortical inhibition to the different fatigue dimensions among MS patients. The project also explored if MS patients have lower levels of intracortical inhibition than healthy controls after controlling for size of motor-evoked potentials (MEPs). Intracortical inhibition, the predictor variable in the regression analyses, was measured in 31 right-handed patients with relapsing-remitting MS using two TMS methods (short-interval intracortical inhibition ratios and contralateral silent periods) over the primary motor cortex representation of the right first dorsal interosseus muscle. The outcome variables were as follows: a) Self-reported fatigue as reported on a Rasch-analyzed composite fatigue scale, b) central fatigability, the latency for the motor threshold to return to baseline and the reduction in MEPs after a maximal contraction task, and c) peripheral fatigability, the decline in muscle electromyographic signal post exercise. Intracortical inhibition in MS patients was also compared to healthy controls after controlling for MEP size in a regression analysis. Among MS patients, intracortical inhibition did not predict self-reported fatigue, ps > .37. Intracortical inhibition also did not correlate with central or peripheral motor fatigability, ps > .20. Small MEPs were related to greater short-interval intracortical inhibition ratios (or less inhibition), r = -0.41, p < .02. However, MS patients showed normal levels of intracortical inhibition even without controlling for MEP size, ps > 0.08. Intracortical inhibition may not be the underlying cortical hyperactivity in MS patients with high fatigue. Lower levels of intracortical inhibition also do not lead to greater central and peripheral motor fatigability. The effect of small MEPs on intracortical inhibition should be controlled by stimulating at a higher intensity relative to the motor threshold among MS patients.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Biology - Neuroscience

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: The interrelationship among maternal infection, folate and vitamin B12 status, and offspring growth in Indigenous Panamanians
rdf:Description.dc:contributor: School of Dietetics and Human Nutrition
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: The Interrelationship among Maternal Infection, Folate and Vitamin B12 Status, and Offspring Growth in Indigenous Panamanians. In Panama, the rates of vitamin B12 deficiency for Indigenous mothers pre- and post-natal are 85% and 46%, respectively, whereas, the rates of folate deficiency pre- and post-natal are 46% and 31%, respectively. Vitamin B12 and folate status, therefore, are public health concerns in this indigenous population. White blood cell indices and a wide range of infection markers emerged as factors associated with the serum concentrations of these two micronutrients. Although maternal vitamin B12 and folate concentrations did not have an association with fetal growth, maternal diet (consumption of animal source foods and green folate source foods) was positively associated with infant weight-for-age and length-for-age, respectively. Furthermore, maternal physical characteristics (specifically height and cardiac rate) and infections (specifically oral and skin infections) emerged as factors associated with infant growth. These findings suggest that a complex interrelationship between maternal infection, vitamin B12 and folate status, and offspring growth exists within this population.

L'interaction entre l'infection maternelle, la croissance en acide folique, la vitamine B12 et la postÃ©ritÃ© dans les PanamÃ©ens autochtones. Dans les populations autochtones prÃ©natales et postnatales, le taux de carence en acide folique dÃ©passe 46% et 31%, respectivement, et en vitamine B12 est 85% et 46%, respectivement. Par consÃ©quent, ces nutriments sont d'importance particuliere l'orsqu'on considÃ¨re la santÃ© gÃ©nÃ©rale de la population. Les globules blancs et une large gamme de marqueurs d'infection sont des facteurs associÃ©s aux concentrations sÃ©riques de ces deux oligo-Ã©lÃ©ments. En dÃ©pit de lÃ bsence d'un lien significatif entre la consommation maternelle de vitamine B12 et de l'acide folique et la croissance du foetus, lÃ limentation de la mÃ¨re (la consommation d'aliments d'origine animale et aliments verts d'origine folate) Ã©tait associÃ© positivement avec le poids-pour-Ã¢ge et la longueur-pour-Ã¢ge du bÃ©bÃ©, respectivement. En outre, les caractÃ©ristiques physiques maternelle (particuliÃ¨rement le taille et le rythme cardiaque) et l'infection maternelle (particuliÃ¨rement les infections pieles et orales) semblent etre associÃ©s Ã la croissance du nourrisson. Ces rÃ©sultats suggÃ¨rent qu'il existe une interaction complexe entre l'infection maternelle, la vitamine B12, l'acide folique et la croissance de la progÃ©niture au sein de cette population.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Health Sciences - Nutrition
